name: Open Source at MITRE
tagline: Open Source software from The MITRE Corporation at GitHub
body:
# Open Source at MITRE

The MITRE Corporation has been involved with many different open source projects throughout the years, many of which have been founded by MITRE itself. This page is an incomplete list of projects that are available here on GitHub. If you would like to add your project to the list, submit an [issue](https://github.com/mitre/mitre.github.com/issues) or (better yet) a [pull request](https://github.com/mitre/mitre.github.com/pulls) with the appropriate changes.

## Projects

* [MITREid Connect](https://github.com/mitreid-connect) Reference implementation of the OpenID Connect protocol
* [RHEx](https://github.com/project-rhex) RESTful Health Exchange 
* [MITRECND](https://github.com/mitrecnd) cybersecurity
* [iMAS](https://github.com/project-imas) iOS Mobile Application Security

### Contact
This site is maintained by @jricher and @ttaylor249 for [The MITRE Corporation](http://www.mitre.org/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
